publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1974 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment (No.2) Order 2004—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment (No.2) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-1974 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment (No.2) Order 2004—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment (No.2) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
